# 股票原始数据检查 -- 2009 年 A 股


## 每个月的数据是一个 RAR 压缩包

#### MD5 码

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:/mnt/data/stock/stock_tick_2009$ md5sum *.rar
c87025730acffa404e1c868f75062693  Stk_Tick_200901.rar
2b1061c76efe5643d697e298cf2dbe00  Stk_Tick_200902.rar
c1aa8afc54a584944a709ca95be2d1de  Stk_Tick_200903.rar
2d5464c4a4bbabce82e336d26936a259  Stk_Tick_200904.rar
bdca1ac7be5e530963b2581038d9980c  Stk_Tick_200905.rar
4965898939fb697911bbe0a31a0f2a8b  Stk_Tick_200906.rar
67b4117857344cbb0cfd74a169d1a924  Stk_Tick_200907.rar
7009235cdf801580a984f127d6975f07  Stk_Tick_200908.rar
4759939d150ba7b7e07b3a6450589765  Stk_Tick_200909.rar
5d5fbcf7cbd6dd525a8087411e32ea54  Stk_Tick_200910.rar
9f0038729efdd6ac35cdcb833078d31a  Stk_Tick_200911.rar
a1851dd15c06aca0b891038bfc619714  Stk_Tick_200912.rar
```

#### 文件大小

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:/mnt/data/stock/stock_tick_2009$ du -h *.rar
660M	Stk_Tick_200901.rar
1.3G	Stk_Tick_200902.rar
1.3G	Stk_Tick_200903.rar
1.3G	Stk_Tick_200904.rar
1.1G	Stk_Tick_200905.rar
1.3G	Stk_Tick_200906.rar
1.6G	Stk_Tick_200907.rar
1.4G	Stk_Tick_200908.rar
1.4G	Stk_Tick_200909.rar
979M	Stk_Tick_200910.rar
1.6G	Stk_Tick_200911.rar
1.5G	Stk_Tick_200912.rar
```

## 每天一个目录，每只股票一个 CSV 文件

解压，最终的输出一定要是 *"All OK"*, 否则，说明个别文件解压出错。

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:~/data/stock/stock_tick_2008$ unrar x Stk_Tick_200810.rar
...
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399917_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399918_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399919_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399920_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399921_20081031.csv            OK
Extracting  Stk_Tick_200810/20081031/SZ399922_20081031.csv            OK
All OK
```

解压后文件夹大小，比 08 年的 87G 增加了很多。

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:~/data/stock/stock_tick_2009$ du -lh -d 1 .
11G	./Stk_Tick_200903
6.1G	./Stk_Tick_200901
13G	./Stk_Tick_200912
11G	./Stk_Tick_200902
13G	./Stk_Tick_200908
15G	./Stk_Tick_200911
12G	./Stk_Tick_200904
14G	./Stk_Tick_200907
9.4G	./Stk_Tick_200905
12G	./Stk_Tick_200906
13G	./Stk_Tick_200909
9.0G	./Stk_Tick_200910
135G	.
```

人工 check 每一天的数据都存在。
三两分钟就 check 完 1 年的数据，投入产出比还是比较高的。

```bash
jackon@gtx1080:/mnt/data/stock/stock_tick_2009$ ls -d */ | xargs ls
Stk_Tick_200901/:
20090105  20090106  20090107  20090108	20090109  20090112  20090113  20090114	20090115  20090116  20090119  20090120	20090121  20090122  20090123
```

2008 年一共开盘 244 天，休息了 121 天。其中 110 天周末，11 天法定假期。

```bash
root@d6a544ab5e30:/src# python scan/day_count.py /mnt/data/stock/stock_tick_2009/
days in Month 01: 15
days in Month 02: 20
days in Month 03: 22
days in Month 04: 21
days in Month 05: 18
days in Month 06: 22
days in Month 07: 23
days in Month 08: 21
days in Month 09: 22
days in Month 10: 16
days in Month 11: 21
days in Month 12: 23
Total: 244 days in 12 months
stock count of each day:
[1747, 1754, 1761, 1757, 1767, 1764, 1775, 1768, 1753, 1762, 1779, 1769, 1766, 1770, 1778, 1781, 1774, 1773, 1771, 1768, 1771, 1767, 1765, 1765, 1771, 1771, 1773, 1768, 1777, 1770, 1769, 1777, 1768, 1765, 1767, 1772, 1778, 1784, 1782, 1767, 1768, 1770, 1776, 1769, 1772, 1764, 1782, 1761, 1777, 1756, 1757, 1769, 1761, 1760, 1751, 1757, 1757, 1767, 1764, 1766, 1762, 1756, 1761, 1730, 1749, 1758, 1732, 1736, 1741, 1717, 1727, 1735, 1737, 1733, 1738, 1708, 1744, 1742, 1764, 1747, 1745, 1753, 1705, 1726, 1736, 1744, 1761, 1672, 1701, 1720, 1703, 1734, 1698, 1741, 1739, 1755, 1746, 1760, 1765, 1763, 1760, 1765, 1770, 1764, 1765, 1755, 1770, 1765, 1773, 1758, 1756, 1755, 1761, 1765, 1747, 1718, 1708, 1726, 1766, 1764, 1785, 1776, 1789, 1780, 1786, 1786, 1783, 1794, 1785, 1775, 1785, 1774, 1791, 1794, 1792, 1792, 1789, 1800, 1797, 1796, 1795, 1815, 1817, 1810, 1804, 1805, 1799, 1810, 1803, 1810, 1812, 1803, 1799, 1812, 1811, 1814, 1809, 1815, 1813, 1825, 1812, 1811, 1828, 1831, 1833, 1824, 1822, 1816, 1828, 1826, 1825, 1819, 1807, 1835, 1834, 1820, 1821, 1829, 1828, 1831, 1819, 1831, 1854, 1848, 1839, 1833, 1847, 1849, 1829, 1839, 1854, 1849, 1865, 1859, 1853, 1847, 1847, 1863, 1854, 1884, 1889, 1898, 1905, 1889, 1906, 1903, 1890, 1908, 1892, 1893, 1879, 1907, 1919, 1920, 1912, 1917, 1910, 1927, 1896, 1910, 1912, 1924, 1913, 1930, 1915, 1922, 1929, 1929, 1923, 1927, 1923, 1926, 1932, 1929, 1924, 1916, 1935, 1935, 1926, 1923, 1895, 1921, 1913, 1924]
```
